results.text: but those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
results.reason: Finding strength through hope in the Lord.
results.reflection: Our strength is renewed when we place our hope in the Lord, enabling us to soar above our challenges.

results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: Drawing strength from Christ for all things.
results.reflection: In Christ, we find the strength to face any situation or obstacle that comes our way.

results.text: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
results.reason: Finding strength in God as our refuge and help.
results.reflection: In times of trouble, God is our unwavering source of strength and refuge.

results.text: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christâ€™s power may rest on me.
results.reason: Discovering strength in Christ's power in our weakness.
results.reflection: In our weaknesses, Christ's power shines through, showing that true strength comes from Him.

results.text: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.
results.reason: Encouragement to be strong in the Lord's power.
results.reflection: Our strength comes from being rooted in the Lord's mighty power, enabling us to stand firm in our faith.
